DOC.brief_summary: This study provide additional efficacy data rizatriptan use acute migraine attack patient already take topiramate migraine prophylaxis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Rizatriptan Treatment Acute Migraine Patients Topiramate Migraine Prophylaxis
DOC.criteria: Patient history migraine without aura one year , 2 8 moderate severe attack per month Patient currently take least 50 mg topiramate daily migraine prophylaxis Patient distinguish migraine type headache Patient agree remain abstinent use effective birth control study Patient pregnant breastfeeding Patient history mostly mild migraine migraine resolve within 2 hour Patient 15 headachedays per month take medication acute headache 10 day per month 3 month prior screen . Patient > 50 year old age migraine onset Patient history heart disease Patient uncontrolled hypertension Patient cancer within 5 year screen ( except certain skin cervical cancer ) Patient start take Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SSRIs ) SerotoninNorepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitors ( SNRIs ) change dos within 3 month screen Patient take one migraine prophylactic medication Patient repeatedly fail respond tolerate rizatriptan
